description: survey area polygons in the UYRW area corresponding to NRCS Soil Data Mart products
NRCS Soil Data Mart products (subfolders correspond to FedData calls using soils_acodes)
SSURGO soils mapping units for UYRW, derived from soils_sdm
SSURGO tabular data for the UYRW area (a list of data frames), derived from soils_sdm
STATSGO2 soils mapping units for UYRW, derived from soils_sdm
STATSGO2 tabular data for the UYRW area (a list of data frames), derived from soils_sdm
areas in URYW with incomplete SSURGO coverage, derived from ssurgo_sf and ssurgo_tab
merged STATSGO2/SSURGO soil mapping units for UYRW
merged STATSGO2/SSURGO tabular data for the UYRW area (a list of data frames)
soil data input CSV for SWAT+, derived from soils_merged_tab
integer code to mukey (MUID) table for SWAT+, connects swat_tif to swat_usersoil
map unit (mukey) raster for SWAT+, connected to swat_usersoil by swat_lookup
image of map units with SSURGO/STATSGO2 data in the UYRW
image of soil water storage for the UYRW
list files of files written by get_soils.R
